countries.country_description: France is one of the oldest nations on Earth and the most ethnically diverse country in Europe.
The United States of America is the world's third largest country in size and nearly the third largest in terms of population.
Germany is bordered by Denmark, Poland, Czechia, Austria, Switzerland, France, Luxembourg, Belgium, Netherlands, the North Sea, and the Baltic Sea.
There are four main islands: Hokkaido, Honshu, Shikoku, and Kyushu.
